channel.title: Need help in java NEEEEED HELP NOW!
channel.description:
i need help with that!!! idk .. i have set up new windows XP to my pc and i have downlaod evry thing java last version from www.java.com and i download jdk 6u7 ..
and i try to open runserver it on then off fastly and i use server 508 and lient 508 when i open it it say
[code]'java' is not recognized as an internal or external command, operable program or batch file. Press any key to continue . . .[/code]
and i can code only :) and java is working like runescape and evrysite soo wats the problme.
any one help ?

item.title: Need help in java NEEEEED HELP NOW!
item.dc:creator: @princess101 princess101
item.description:
@princess101 wrote:

thats in server runserver.bat here

@echo off title Ddsspeced java -Xmx512m -cp .;./jython.jar;./MySql/mysql-connector-java-3.0.08-ga-bin.jar server

and in client run.

@echo off cd files java -Xmx256m client 66 live live software members english game1 pause

any help?[br][br][size=1]Posted on: October 31, 2008, 07:53:19 am[/size][hr]i have do that and put this to runservr.bat not my client…

primadude thanks but it wont work :S:S…

btw… i have ur hotmail legend…

any idea ?.

Read full topic
item.source: Need help in java NEEEEED HELP NOW!

item.title: Need help in java NEEEEED HELP NOW!
item.dc:creator: @legend-scape legend-scape
item.description:
@legend-scape wrote:

[quote=“primadude, post:3, topic:240329”]Replace everything in your Runserver batch file with this, and tell me if it works/doesn’t work:

@echo off title Initialize Server java -Xmx512m -cp .;./jython.jar;./MySql/mysql-connector-java-3.0.08-ga-bin.jar server[/quote]

i duno then, 508’s r stupid,

Read full topic

@primadude wrote:

Replace everything in your Runserver batch file with this, and tell me if it works/doesn’t work:

@echo off title Initialize Server java -Xmx512m -cp .;./jython.jar;./MySql/mysql-connector-java-3.0.08-ga-bin.jar server
